abstract: Despite being under fire over its failure to recall defective cars, General Motors had a strong showing in J.D. Power’s annual quality survey of new vehicles.
snippet: Despite being under fire over its failure to recall defective cars, General Motors had a strong showing in J.D. Power’s annual quality survey of new vehicles.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — While General Motors was under fire in Washington at a House hearing over its failure to recall defective cars, the automaker received some welcome news at home on Wednesday with a strong showing in the annual J.D. Power quality survey of new vehicles.

headline.main: General Motors Receives Welcome News in Automotive Survey
